name: SouthernlisticRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: southern radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Southernlistic Radio broadcasts 24/7

Southernlistic Radio programming includes a wide range of music, women’s issues, comedy, democracy now, local national and international public affairs, call -in discussions and more.

As part of our mission to educate, every Southernlistic Radio DJ is encouraged to play a variety of musical styles and genres. Rather than segregating music into limited boxes. This philosophy is an attempt to entertain the listener while broadcasting their musical experience. Pretty fun way to be educated, don’t you think.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
